Play Kirby & The Amazing Mirror GBA Online – Metroidvania Adventure

Kirby & The Amazing Mirror brings a fresh twist to the beloved Kirby franchise on the Game Boy Advance. Kirby is split into four differently colored versions of himself, and players must navigate a non-linear Mirror World to repair the shattered Magic Mirror and defeat a shadowy villain.

What is Kirby & The Amazing Mirror?

Kirby & The Amazing Mirror is a 2004 action-platformer featuring an interconnected, Metroidvania-style world. Unlike previous linear Kirby games, this installment allows exploration in multiple directions, secret paths, and cooperative gameplay for up to four players. Players can summon their Kirby counterparts for assistance in tricky areas or during battles.

How to Play Kirby & The Amazing Mirror

  • Control Kirby: Use jumping, flying, and abilities to explore the Mirror World.
  • Copy Abilities: Absorb powers from enemies to gain new skills.
  • Multiplayer Cooperation: Up to four players can join in to help each other.
  • Explore Non-Linear Levels: Navigate interconnected areas to find secrets and items.
  • Defeat Bosses: Confront challenging enemies to progress and repair the Magic Mirror.
